RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 1 1M Dirt CR: 82. Claiming Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR THREE YEAR OLDS. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $14,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: MAGICAL WAYS was hustled from the gate, attended the pace on the inside of a foe, vied near the rail on the turn, turned into the stretch in the two path, extended the advantage while shaken up in upper stretch, drew off while kept to the task under a hand-ride until inside the sixteenth-pole then was eased up while much the best. UNION LIGHTS settled off the pace, angled in near the three-quarter pole, drafted behind the leader while inside on the turn, was given his cue at the five-sixteenths, shifted three wide into the stretch and was second best. CHEEKY TICO stalked the pace on the inside of a rival, was asked in the three path on the turn, dropped back four wide into the stretch and tired. CHARGER attended the pace on the outside, dropped back in the two path while between foes on the turn and came up empty. PRINCE OF JOY tracked the pace on the outside, was asked four wide on the turn, dropped back five wide into the stretch and capitulated.

ENTRY.NAME: Magical Ways
ENTRY.OWNER: Rice Linda and Durrett David J
ENTRY.COMMENT: attended pace inside,led from 5-1/2,2p1/4,drew off,eased up

ENTRY.NAME: Charger
ENTRY.OWNER: La Marca Stable and Rodriguez Rudy R
ENTRY.COMMENT: attended pace outside,drop back btwn foes 2p turn,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Cheeky Tico
ENTRY.OWNER: Three Player's Stable and Barrera III Oscar S
ENTRY.COMMENT: stalked inside foe,asked 3path turn,4p into lane,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Union Lights
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled,mvd in3/4,ins turn,3w1/4,no match,clear for place

ENTRY.NAME: Prince of Joy
ENTRY.COMMENT: tracked outside, asked 4wide turn, 5wide into lane,empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 2 6F Dirt CR: 81. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. OUTER TURF (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, TWO YEARS OLD. Weight, 119 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred). (Rail at 12 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: IRISH GENT (IRE) stumbled at the start, moved in while going to the front, went around the turn in the two path, responded well when roused into the stretch and held under strong urging. TYPHOON FURY was hustled from the gate, chased the pace on the outside then four on the turn, pursued the winner under a drive in the stretch and willingly earned the place. FIRST TRUMPET lost his footing at the start then bumped with a foe, was well placed just off the pace, moved out outside the half-mile pole, chased three wide on the turn and tired. PET MAT broke out and bumped with a rival, settled off the pace, saved ground while roused on the turn and lacked the needed response. STREET EARNINGS angled out early, was coaxed along on the outside, chased in the five path on the turn and came up empty. WON TEAM was bumped at the start, angled out early, raced at the rear, went around the turn in the two path and was no factor. BOURBON OUTLAW bumped with foes on both sides at the start, was urged along off the pace, went three wide on the turn and failed to respond. WON TEAM RACED FOR PURSE-MONEY ONLY

ENTRY.NAME: Won Team
ENTRY.COMMENT: bumped start,angled out,2path turn,no factor,purse money only

ENTRY.NAME: First Trumpet
ENTRY.COMMENT: lost footing brk,bmpd,well placed,mvd out4-1/2,3p turn,tired

ENTRY.NAME: Bourbon Outlaw
ENTRY.OWNER: Bourbon Lane Stable (J Hill M McMahon) Seidman Stables LLC Lake Star Stable Tama
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd btwn brk,urged along,3wide turn,no response

ENTRY.NAME: Irish Gent (IRE)
ENTRY.OWNER: Low, Lawana L. and Robert E.

ENTRY.NAME: Typhoon Fury
ENTRY.OWNER: Repole Stable and R A Hill Stable

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 3 1M Dirt CR: 81. Claiming Purse 55000. FOR FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $25,000 (Maiden And Claiming Races For $20,000 Or Less Not Considered In Allowances ) (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: SUSPENDED CAMPAIGN bumped with a rival at the start, showed no speed under urging, dropped well behind the rest of the field, moved from the two path to the four path on the turn, came seven wide into the stretch, rallied outside into the final furlong, closed strongly to get the lead in final sixteenth then moved clear while eased up nearing the finish. SISTER LINDA bumped with a rival at the start, was well placed just off the pace, moved out near the nine-sixteenths, gained in the three path to make a bid with three furlongs to run, took the lead into upper stretch, led under a drive into the final sixteenth but was overtaken while clear for the place. VEGAS WEEKEND was hustled to the front, showed the way down the backstretch, vied inside on the turn, was asked under threat outside the five-sixteenths, lost the advantage into upper stretch and weakened. GRINGOTTS broke out and bumped with a rival, moved out early then settled off the pace, was urged along in the two path on the turn and failed to threaten. TRIPLE P was hustled from the start, moved up to press the pace on the outside then chased starting outside the five-eighths pole, went four wide on the turn, spun five wide into the stretch and came up empty.

ENTRY.NAME: Gringotts
ENTRY.COMMENT: broke out,bmpd,mvd out early,settled,2p turn,no threat

ENTRY.NAME: Sister Linda
ENTRY.OWNER: Nevin Michelle and Togabred Racing LLC

ENTRY.NAME: Suspended Campaign
ENTRY.OWNER: Zilla Racing Stables Black Jack Racing LLC and Acqua Nova Stable
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd brk,no speed,well behind,2-4p turn,7p1/4,rallied,clr,easd up

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 4 1M Dirt CR: 85. Claiming Purse 28000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Non-winners Of A Race At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Claiming Price $16,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STRONG LIGHT was last into stride, settled at the rear, moved in outside the half-mile pole, shifted from the rail to the three path while roused on the turn, moved out while rallying in the final furlong, closed well to make a bid between late and got up under strong urging. GOOD RAPPORT showed the way with a clear advantage while well off the rail, went around the turn in the four path, came under the crop in upper stretch, led under a drive into the final sixteenth but was caught while just able to hold the place. LUCKY LUCKY LUKE broke out and brushed with a foe, moved out early, settled under some urging, shifted from the two path to the four path while dropping farther off the pace on the turn, came six wide into the stretch, rallied outside into the final furlong, drifted in while closing near the sixteenth-pole, made a bid in the final sixteenth and just missed the place. PROVEN HOPE tracked the pace on the outside, was urged along in the five path on the turn, pursued the leader under a drive into the final furlong and weakened. LEGENDARY LORE brushed with a rival at the start, leapt in the air approaching the seven-eighths pole, was well placed just off the pace, went around the turn in the two path and came up empty. UNCLE WATER FLOW was well placed just off the pace, chased inside on the turn and tired. SCOTTO settled off the pace, was urged along passing the nine-sixteenths, went four then five wide on the turn, passed the five-sixteenths under the crop and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Uncle Water Flow
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, chased inside turn, tired

ENTRY.NAME: Legendary Lore
ENTRY.OWNER: Epona Racing Stable and Toga Party Racing Stable

ENTRY.NAME: Scotto
ENTRY.OWNER: Cipriano Vito Scotti Neil Alfleri Anthony and Bochilo Vincent

ENTRY.NAME: Strong Light
ENTRY.COMMENT: last away,settled,mvd in 1/2,ins-3p turn,mvd out,rallied,up late

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 5 6F Dirt CR: 71. Maiden Claiming Purse 38000. FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $30,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be V oid).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: BAD LARRY broke out then was hustled, contested the pace on the outside, vied in the two path on the turn, shook clear into upper stretch, responded well in the final furlong and held under steady urging. WOODSIDE WARRIOR was urged along just off the pace, saved ground on the turn, shifted to the two path at the quarter-pole, angled out in upper stretch, pursued the winner to the finish and willingly earned the place. WAR PRINCE was urged along off the pace, went two then three wide on the turn, came five wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response while able to get the show. WATCH HILL dropped well behind, went four wide on the turn, came five wide into the stretch and failed to threaten then missed the show. MAJESTIC ARC bumped very hard with a foe at the start, moved up to track the pace on the outside, chased in the three path on the turn and tired. CHALKY CAT bumped very hard with a foe at the start then was taken up with a snatch of the left-rein, settled towards the rear, was urged three wide on the turn and was no factor. MALIBU MYSTERY was hustled from the gate, disputed the pace on the inside of a rival, vied along the rail on the turn, dropped back into upper stretch and capitulated.

ENTRY.NAME: Watch Hill
ENTRY.COMMENT: at rear, 4wide turn, 5w into lane, missed show

ENTRY.NAME: War Prince
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,2-3path turn,5w into lane,lacked needed response

ENTRY.NAME: Chalky Cat
ENTRY.COMMENT: bmpd hard brk,tkn up,settled,3wide turn,no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Malibu Mystery
ENTRY.OWNER: Donk David G Punk Jr William J Behrendt John T Marquis Charles K and Carney Sean

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 6 7F Dirt CR: 89. Maiden Special Weight Purse 90000. (UP TO $15,660 NYSBFOA) FOR MAIDENS, THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD. Three Year Olds, 121 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. (Non-Starters For A Claiming Price Of $40,000 Or Less In The Last 3 Starts Preferred).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: PHELPSY went to the front, showed the way down the backstretch, responded well when asked for his best in upper stretch and drew off under steady urging. LOGIN REQUIRED stalked the pace on the outside, was asked in the three path on the turn, chased the winner into upper stretch and was second best. LIGHT THE WAY pressed the pace on the inside of the winner, dropped just off the pace midway down the backstretch, saved ground on the turn and came up empty while best of the rest. BURTON WAY settled just off the pace, was urged three then four wide on the turn, came five wide into the stretch and lacked the needed response. OPPORTUNITY SET settled on the outside, was urged four wide on the turn and failed to respond. HOLDING AU PAIR dropped well behind, saved ground on the turn and was no factor. FLYING LIAM was well placed just off the pace, dropped back leaving the backstretch, went two to three wide on the turn and had nothing left.

ENTRY.NAME: Holding Au Pair
ENTRY.COMMENT: well behind, inside turn, no factor

ENTRY.NAME: Flying Liam
ENTRY.OWNER: St Elias Stable Hudson Stable LLC and Margotta Jr Anthony R
ENTRY.COMMENT: well placed, dropped back 7/16, 2-3path turn, faltered

ENTRY.NAME: Burton Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: just off pace,urged 3-4wide turn,5w into lane,empty

ENTRY.NAME: Light the Way
ENTRY.COMMENT: pressed ins,drop back 4-1/2,inside turn,empty,best of rest

ENTRY.NAME: Phelpsy
ENTRY.OWNER: Lawrence William H Drown Jeffrey Three Chimneys Farm LLC (Goncalo B Torrealba) a

ENTRY.NAME: Login Required
ENTRY.OWNER: Goldfarb Sanford J Fielding John D Estate of Ira Davis and Morrison Matthew J

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 7 1M Dirt CR: 98. Allowance Optional Claiming Purse 85000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 TWICE OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON THREE RACES OR OPTIONAL CLAIMING PRICE OF $45,000. T hree Year Olds, 122 lbs.; Older, 126 lbs. Non-winners Of Two Races Other Than Claiming Or Starter At A Mile Or Over In 2023 Allowed 2 lbs. Such A Race In 2023 Allowed 4 lbs. Claiming Price $45,000 (Allowance Horses Preferred)(1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Claim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (If the Stewards consider it inadvisable to run this race on the turf course, this race will be run at One Mile on the Main Track.) (Rail at 9 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: STRAIGHT ARROW was well placed just off the pace, drafted in the two path for most of the turn, shifted three then four wide while full of run late on that bend, rallied to the lead in upper stretch and powered away under steady urging. SHADOW DRAGON prompted the pace on the outside, vied in the three path on the turn and earned the place while no match for the winner. CALLALOO went to the front, showed the way with company to his outside, vied inside for most of the turn then moved to two path, lost the advantage into upper stretch and weakened then lost the place but was clear for the show. CUT THE CORD moved out then settled on the outside, was urged five wide on the turn, angled out in upper stretch and came up empty. BIG BOBBY broke a step slow, moved up to track the pace on the outside, chased four then five wide on the turn, spun six wide into the stretch and capitulated. LET'S GO BIG BLUE settled near the back, dropped back leaving the backstretch, was urged three wide on the turn and failed to respond.

ENTRY.NAME: Let's Go Big Blue
ENTRY.COMMENT: settled, dropped back 7/16, 3wide turn, no response

ENTRY.NAME: Callaloo
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,ins-2path turn,headed into upper,wknd,lost2nd

ENTRY.NAME: Big Bobby
ENTRY.OWNER: Arenas Marcelo and God's Glory Stables
ENTRY.COMMENT: off step slow,mvd up,tracked outside,chased 4-5w turn,6w,empty

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 8 6F Dirt CR: 90. Allowance Purse 80000. FOR THREE YEAR OLDS AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY WHICH HAVE NEVER WON $18,000 OTHER THAN MAIDEN, CLAIMING OR STARTER OR WHICH HAVE NEVER WON TWO RACES. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 123 lbs. Non- winners Of A Race Other Than Claiming Or Starter Allowed 2 lbs.
RACE.FOOTNOTES: GENERAL BANKER was urged along at the rear, moved out while dropping further back outside the half-mile pole, went four wide on the turn, rallied outside in upper stretch, closed strongly to get the lead inside the furlong marker, fought with the runner-up to the finish and prevailed. MY LAST MISSION showed good speed, set the pace under pressure to his outside, vied along the rail on the turn, lost the advantage in upper stretch, fought on well in the final furlong but missed while clear for the place. G MUNNING was well placed just off the pace, tossed his head under restraint leaving the backstretch, raced inside to the two path on the turn, was asked with three furlongs to run, came three wide into the stretch, moved out around the furlong marker and was along for the show. DR. SETTLE'S DREAM chased the pace on the outside then three wide on the turn, made a bid at the five-sixteenths, took the lead in upper stretch, led into the final furlong then was headed by the winner and weakened. NEWPORT BRIDGE pressed the pace on the outside, vied in the two path on the turn and tired. TEN CENT TOWN stumbled badly at the start and unseated the rider.

ENTRY.NAME: General Banker
ENTRY.COMMENT: urged along,drop back 1/2,mvd out,4w trn,rallied,lead ins1/8,held

ENTRY.NAME: My Last Mission
ENTRY.COMMENT: set pressured pace,ins foe,ins turn,headed3/16,fought on,missed

RACE.RACE_TEXT: BELMONT AT THE BIG A RACE 9 1M Dirt CR: 72. Maiden Claiming Purse 43000. OUTER TURF FOR MAIDENS, FILLIES AND MARES THREE YEARS OLD AND UPWARD FOALED IN NEW YORK STATE AND APPROVED BY THE NEW YORK STATE-BRED REGISTRY. Three Year Olds, 120 lbs.; Older, 124 lbs. Claiming Price $40,000 (1.5% Aftercare Assessment Due At Time Of Cl aim Otherwise Claim Will Be Void). (Rail at 12 feet).
RACE.FOOTNOTES: CHARISSE stumbled at the start, settled at the rear, moved closer outside the half-mile pole, rallied in the four path on the turn, closed quickly to get the lead passing the five-sixteenths and drew away under steady urging. PUREST PERFORMANCE disputed the pace on the outside, moved clear near the nine-sixteenths, raced in the two path on the turn, was collared by the winner passing the five-sixteenths and proved no match while well clear for the place. DEBBIE DARLING was hustled from the gate,. moved in while settling off the pace, was shuffled back some behind BENEVOLENTLY as that foe dropped back late on the backstretch, started the turn in the two path, angled five wide at the five-eighths and lacked the needed response while best of the rest. MY ROYAL VOW settled on the outside, was urged between foes passing the half-mile pole, went three then four wide on the turn and came up empty. SHOPPINGATBLOOMIES settled off the pace, was urged between foes late on the backstretch, went around the turn in the two path and capitulated. BENEVOLENTLY disputed the pace on the inside of a rival, dropped back near the nine-sixteenths, fell further back late on the backstretch and stopped then was eased in the stretch but walked off.

ENTRY.NAME: Charisse
ENTRY.OWNER: Parsons, Jr., William and Howe, David S.

ENTRY.NAME: Shoppingatbloomies
ENTRY.OWNER: Beast Mode Racing LLC and America's Pastime Stables
